author: Keith Wagstaff
title: Sorry Beyonc√© fans, here's who you'll get at Coachella instead
text:
The organizers of Coachella have found Beyonc√©'s replacement.
It's Lady Gaga! Which is cool, but ... she's not Beyonc√©.
SEE ALSO: Tracy Morgan delivers Destiny‚Äôs Child burn from Beyonc√©‚Äôs womb on 'SNL'
They could have replaced her with Jesus and Elvis fresh from a time machine and some people would still be disappointed.
Let's party in the desert! üå¥‚úåÔ∏èüé§ pic.twitter.com/2SYOv7TscF
‚Äî xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) March 1, 2017
After it was originally announced Beyonc√© was performing, both weekends of Coachella sold out in three hours. And the general admission starting price was $399. (Record time for a Coachella sellout, according to LA Weekly , was 40 minutes in 2015. Because Drake, Jack White and AC/DC?)
It turns out, however, that being very pregnant with twins isn't great for performing in front of thousands of people.
So Lady Gaga will end her glorious descent from the Super Bowl halftime show by landing in the warm California desert in April. Enjoy, Little Monsters.
BONUS: Grammy love affair between Adele and Beyonc√© had all of us reaching for the tissues
